name: Purgatory (itch) (NathanPhilliber)
description:
You must control three platformer characters as you try to dodge and kill enemy reapers. Try to see how high of a score you can get. The more characters you can keep alive at once, the faster your score will increase.

This game was created during Cal Poly Game Development Club's 48 Hour Game Jam, which took place the weekend of November 11th. The theme of the game jam was "multitasking."
